article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WMyaXc hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Florida’s Parallel Universe

div.p: The abandoned Nike Missile Site, surrounded by the Everglades, is a reminder of when humans almost destroyed the world and a warning that we could still lose everything today.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11wwg0W hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Social Media Guide To Ruining Your Relationship

div.p: Everything that's allegedly great about communication for humans is terrible for romance.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10xiZm4 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Age Of The Russian Oligarch Comes To An End

div.p: Boris Berezovsky, the self-made billionaire and archetypical Russian oligarch, has died at the age of 67 in London, where he had lived since falling out with the Putin-led Kremlin more than a decade ago. In a sense, his death marks the end of the original age of Russian oligarchs.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WKQ6l8 hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: WE ALWAYS THOUGHT YOU WERE WEIRD

h2.a: You Might Be A Martian

div.p: The Curiosity rover found gray mud on the red planet, suggesting that there may have been life—and that we might be descended from it.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14eR9y8 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Newtown Victim's Parents Describe Meeting With Adam Lanza's Father

div.p: When Alissa and Robbie Parker met face to face recently with the father of the young man who killed their daughter and 19 other first-graders at Sandy Hook Elementary School, they weren't angry with him and didn't blame him for the massacre.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-X0fdCT hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Britain's Most Accomplished Cat Burglar Gets An Awesome Obituary

div.p: Peter Scott, who has died aged 82, was a highly accomplished cat burglar, and as Britain’s most prolific plunderer of the great and good took particular pains to select his victims from the ranks of aristocrats, film stars and even royalty.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Yf8Bl4 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: JJ Abrams Reveals His Vision For 'Man Of Steel'

div.p: The "Star Trek" director talks about how his leaked "Superman Flyby" is turning out to look a lot like Zack Snyder's "Man Of Steel."

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-105ueQc hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: 10 White People Who Inexplicably Became Ninjas

div.p: It’s like ninjas have their own version of Affirmative Action just for white guys, and thus several Euro-Americans have managed to snag honorary ninja degrees when they had no business doing so.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16PP4Ix hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Tilda Swinton Is Currently Sleeping In A Box At MoMA

div.p: On random days this month, Tilda Swinton (actress, Bowie-enthusiast, badass) will be performing her 1995 piece "The Maybe," which consists of Swinton sleeping in a glass box.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11vSD6J hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Websites Can Legally Pirate Porn Movies, Prosecutors Rule

div.p: This week prosecutors made the decision not to prosecute the alleged pirates, ruling that since pornography is obscene it isn’t worthy of copyright protection.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Zc0fHo hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: What Are The Winklevoss Brothers Up To Now?

div.p: If revenge is a dish — like a lobster roll — best served cold, then the Winklevii are feasting.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11oqSZS hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: How To Get Real Eggs On Your McDonald's Breakfast Sandwich

div.p: You can get your McDonald's biscuit sandwiches (or any breakfast sandwich, for that matter) made with a 100% real egg, cracked and cooked fresh on-premises.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z7Xirw hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Your Laser Pointer Is Probably Illegal

div.p: A new study shows a majority of the dinky laser pointers on the market exceed the power level limits set by the Code of Federal Regulations, which means a whole lot of twerps out there wield far more retina-burning power than they should.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Y6wR6A hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: AND GOD SAID IT WAS GOOD

h2.a: The Story Of Earth In 2 Minutes And 20 Seconds

div.p: How old is the Earth, how long did it take for life to appear?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11wmCeI hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Look At These Chinese Workers Carrying Mind-Blowing Amounts Of Stuff

div.p: If these photos look impossible, that’s because they are. Their loads have been digitally increased as part of a photo project on the Chinese economy and global consumerism.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YwGGHr hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Incredibly Detailed Shadow Sculptures

div.p: Artist Diet Wiegman manages to sculpt mounds of irregularly shaped structures that are transformed into an intricately detailed silhouette when a light shines on it from a precise angle.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-105jTnA hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Ford Is Forced To Apologize For Horrendously Offensive Ads

div.p: Ford and its ad agency issued apologies for a tasteless Ford Figo ad — in which former Italian PM Silvio Berlusconi is shown with a bunch of gagged and crying women in the trunk of his car — that was never meant to see the light of day.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15BccXR hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: This Is What Your Favorite Political Websites Looked Like 10 Years Ago

div.p: Web design has come a long, long way.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YfW8xl hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: NIGHT OF A THOUSAND THROWING STARS

h2.a: World Ninjas Gather In Japan

div.p: More than 200 ninjas from around the world gathered at a Tokyo gymnasium Friday to kick off a two-day training seminar, especially designed for women.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10xhmF6 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Senate Vote Shows Support For Internet Sales Tax

div.p: The U.S. Senate on Friday previewed how it might vote on legislation that would make online retailers pay out-of-state sales tax. Senators voted 75-24 for a non-binding amendment to budget plans, as a way to test support for the proposed Marketplace Fairness Act.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WK0Hg8 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Inside Manhattan's Tower Of Internet

div.p: The construction is "the second largest project on the island" though "a distant second to the Freedom Center," still going up a little under a mile west. It will be the first data center to open in New York since Hurricane Sandy.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WSlj7n hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: How To Hotrod A Mini Jet With Butane And A Stun Gun

div.p: This thing rules, and with a few refinements could totally put that Tesla drone to shame.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZFZSow hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Manatees Dying In Droves On Both Coasts Of Florida

div.p: “There are indications of the animals being otherwise completely healthy — but having died of shock and drowning,” said marine mammal biologist Ann Spellman, with the Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission, the state agency tasked with the investigation.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11pLctR hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: GET PUMPED UP BY A SHOCK OF WHEAT

h2.a: The 17 Worst Mascots Of March Madness

div.p: From oranges to blobs to animals who are better suited for a petting zoo, here are the most absurd mascots of the top 68 teams vying for the NCAA Championship this Year.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Yh1p82 hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: NOT HARD TO ARGUE AGAINST JERRY LEWIS

h2.a: Female Comedians Respond To And Disprove That Pesky 'Women Aren't Funny' Claim

div.p: My favorite response came from Romy & Michelle's High School Reunion writer Robin Schiff: "One of the reasons I think women aren't funny is because we're so busy thinking about when we can give our next blowjob, it's like our brains are so crowded up with that, we don't have time to think of funny things to say."

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z8sKWG hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: STIFF UPPER LIP CONTINUES ITS REIGN

h2.a: American English Has Become Way More Emotional Than British English

div.p: A study comparing mood-related words in U.S. and British books shows that Americans increasingly use emotional words more often.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YJRTU4 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Could An Asbestos Contaminated Tarantula Be On The Loose?

div.p: It's a scenario seemingly designed to give arachnophobes nightmares, but it's one that an asbestos team working in an attic in Cardiff this week have encountered.
